title: Chicago Favorites
description: A curated list of favorite places in Chicago.

places.name: Chicago Pizza and Oven Grinder Company
places.description: Cash-only eatery in a historic brownstone serving its famous pizza-pot-pies plus grinders & more.

places.name: La Catedral Cafe
places.personalNote: Cafe de olla and chilaquiles are my go-to.

places.name: Stay and Play Game Cafe
places.description: Good Food + Tasty Drinks + Fun Board Games = Stay and Play Game Cafe Experience!

places.name: Jibaritos Y Mas
places.description: Relaxed counter-serve joint preparing Puerto Rican bites to eat in or take-out.
places.personalNote: I usually order the steak sandwich. Prices are reasonable too.

places.name: Longman & Eagle
places.description: Longman & Eagle is a contemporary take on a traditional Chicago inn—offering considered, inspired drinking, eating and sleeping options—located in the Logan Square neighborhood in Chicago, USA.

places.name: Tempesta Market
places.description: Hybrid deli, sandwich shop & grocery market with artisanal fare, full bar & prepared foods to go.
places.personalNote: Good meatball and chicken parm sandwiches

places.name: Garfield Park Conservatory
places.description: 184-acre park with a swimming pool, fishing lagoon, athletic fields & tennis courts.
places.personalNote: Nice place especially during the winter months if you want access to nature indoors.

places.name: Small Cheval
places.description: Popular burgers, shakes, beer, and cocktails in rustic digs and a patio, plus offers takeouts.
places.personalNote: Decent burgers. The patio is family friendly and there's enough room for you to spread out.

places.name: Shoreline Architecture Boats Tours
places.description: From hidden treasures to the city’s most well-known sights, you’ll view over 40 Chicago landmarks on our 75-minute Architecture River Boat Tours.
places.personalNote: This is a different way to see the city and learn a few things along the way.

places.name: MCCB Chicago
places.description: Warm, casual outlet offering elevated & modern Sichuan & Canton fare such as charcoal grilled fish.

places.name: Chicago Botanic Garden
places.description: 385 acres of landscaped gardens displaying millions of plants & flowers in a variety of settings.
places.personalNote: Nice place to spend the day outdoors. My favorite is the Dwarf Conifer Garden.

places.name: Sugar Moon
places.description: Sugar Moon is a small neighborhood bakeshop located in Logan Square. We offer elevated home-style pastries with an appreciation for old-school techniques.
places.personalNote: Get here before opening time. Line starts to form quickly

places.name: Chicago Pickle Eatery
places.description: From our East Coast roots to our commitment to quality, we’re passionate about bringing the best of New York-inspired deli and comfort food to Chicago.
places.personalNote: The giant sandwiches are...giant. You can probably split one between 2+ people.

places.name: Moonwalker Cafe
places.description: We are a neighborhood cafe known for our made to order sandwiches and Dark Matter Coffee drinks.
places.personalNote: Great local spot. Their breakfast burrito and bacon egg and cheese bagels are good.
